__e: Clark, I know that Lex isn't exactly your pick for Man of the Year... but you can't just turn your back on him.
Lex, I don't know what she told you, but she came on to me.
I don't know what happened between her and your father but she's not my mother.
You told me you weren't gonna marry Lex, and then all of a sudden, somehow... something changed your mind, what was it?
What's Lex doing and why am I a part of it?
I'd like to think that there was a time when Lex and I had a real friendship.
If you know something about that boy Lex getting shot, now is your last chance to speak to that.
From what you've told me about Lex, he's a man who's concerned with power.
Mom, what if part of who Lex is... is because of me?
Lex's plane's in the air now. But he won't be back until tomorrow.
Maybe this is the one time Lex was actually telling the truth.
I'd bet anything that Lex is somehow behind this.
I can. I-I was... And Lex looked at me and said...
Lex, I like my work here, but research has always been my first love.
Lex told me this one-night-stand was something that never happens.
